segments.text: As I glance around, I see the familiar setting of a kitchen, yet it’s filled with tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink seems so engaged, polishing that plate without a single worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But all I can focus on is the water cascading over the edge, pooling dangerously on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a little shocking that she hasn’t noticed the chaos forming below her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are so animated in their cookie quest; it’s almost playful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, their laughter feels misplaced as the danger looms large.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is stretching to his limits, and my stomach knots at the thought of him falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so sweet, her open palm waiting for a treat, totally unaware of the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I could almost laugh at the innocence of it all if it weren’t so risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a reminder of how quickly things can go from lighthearted to catastrophic.
segments.speaker: PAR
